The City of Ballinger has by ordinance adopted registration requirements for contractors operating in the city. All licenses run on a yearly non-prorated fee, for the period between Jan. 1 and Dec. 31.

Alarm contractors:
While not required, upon voluntary request the City may issue an alarm contractor or installer who wishes to have a city registration as a supplement to their state licensure.

The application for licensure can be done in-person at City Hall (700 Railroad Ave.), via email at
[rjalomo@baltx.org](mailto:rjalomo@baltx.org)
, or standard mail.

The City may require licensure for other trades in recent updates to our code and ordinance. Call City Hall at 325-365-3511 or email rjalomo
[@baltx.org](mailto:BC@BalTX.org)
for more information.
